home.description: I'm a passionate iOS developer with a strong focus on creating user-friendly and efficient mobile applications. I'm dedicated to delivering high-quality code and innovative solutions to complex problems.

about.subtitle: Get to know the person behind the code. My journey, passions, and what drives me as a developer.

services.title: App Development
services.description: Mobile iOS app development using Swift and SwiftUI.

work.subtitle: My professional journey through the years and valuable lessons learned.

career.title: iOS Developer
career.description: As an iOS consultant at OBSS, I contributed to the development of the iOS mobile application for Albanian Bank BKT. My role involved collaborating with a talented team to create user-friendly features, ensuring seamless functionality using Swift-SwiftUI, and maintaining high standards through rigorous testing. This experience honed my skills in mobile app development and strengthened my problem-solving abilities.

career.title: Intern
career.description: Holistics , SIEM Team, SOC Team , Blue Team , Red Team and observed how they work and operate.  Learned about Secure App & Web Development techniques and how to avoid certain security vulnerabilities , Logging & SIEM Programs (Splunk).

career.title: Intern
career.description: I worked on porting existing embedded systems (POS) software to Android and IOS using Java , C# and Microsoft's Xamarin Framework.

education.title: Bachelor of Computer Science
education.description: Graduated from Marmara University in 2021 with a degree in Computer Engineering, equipped with a strong foundation in Clean Code and Mofile App Development.

iOS & Swift - The Complete iOS App Development Bootcamp
